00001 #ifndef VALCHECK_H
00002 #define VALCHECK_H
00003 
00004 /* macros for checking arguments */
00005 
00006 /* true is x is a power of two */
00007 #define IS_POW2(x) (!(((x)-1)&(x)))
00008 
00009 /* is power of two? */
00010 #define CHECK_POW2(x) if(!IS_POW2(x)) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be a power of two.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x)
00011 /* is positive power of two? */
00012 #define CHECK_PPOW2(x) if(!IS_POW2(x) || ((x) < 1)) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be a positive power of two.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x)
00013 /* is not negative? (i.e. >= 0) */
00014 #define CHECK_NNEG(x) if(((x) < 0)) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be non-negative.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x)
00015 /* is positive? (i.e. > 0) */
00016 #define CHECK_POS(x) if(((x) <= 0)) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be positive.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x)
00017 /* is not negative and <= y? */
00018 #define CHECK_NNEG_LEQ(x,y) if(((x) < 0) || ((x)>(y))) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be non-negative and less than or equal to %lf.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x,(double)(y))
00019 /* is positive and <= y? */
00020 #define CHECK_POS_LEQ(x,y) if(((x) <= 0) || ((x)>(y))) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be positive and less than or equal to %lf.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x,(double)(y))
00021 /* is not negative and < y? */
00022 #define CHECK_NNEG_LT(x,y) if(((x) < 0) || ((x)>=(y))) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be non-negative and less than or equal to %lf.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x,(double)(y))
00023 /* is positive and < y? */
00024 #define CHECK_POS_LT(x,y) if(((x) <= 0) || ((x)>=(y))) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be positive and less than or equal to %lf.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x,(double)(y))
00025 /* is positive and > y? */
00026 #define CHECK_POS_GT(x,y) if(((x) <= 0) || ((x)<=(y))) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be positive and greater than %lf.",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x,(double)(y))
00027 /* is boolean? */
00028 #define CHECK_BOOL(x) if(((x) != 0) && ((x) != 1)) fatal("%s(%s) %s must be boolean (0 or 1).",name,COMPONENT_NAME,#x)
